We need a bold strategy to protect civil rights.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Last week did not yield the results we were hoping for statewide in Alabama. However, I am reminded how invested so many of you have been in your communities. You have organized and rallied around important issues and initiatives despite the barriers put in front of you, and we are fortunate to have your support.

With the Ten Commandments and Anti-Abortion amendments passing, we will need to build a bold strategy to maintain reproductive freedom and religious rights in Alabama.

Read more about the ACLU of Alabama's extensive work during the 2018 midterms.

Learn More

I look forward to seeing how we can continue building momentum for civil rights and liberties — we have work to do!

Sincerely,

Randall Marshall
Executive Director, ACLU of Alabama
